desc1: VirWings is a drone selling website. A new visitor of virwings will see the Home page and All Product page. A visitor must have an account on virwings to see product details or place an order. One can create an account with email and password or directly can log in with a google account.
desc2: After successfully logging in, a dashboard will be provided to a user / admin. On user’s dashboard they can see their orders. On admin’s dashboard they can see all orders from all users of virwings. Only admin can make a user to admin. Here is an admin account for testing purpose. Email: admin@admin.com, Password: 123456

desc1: TravelOne is a tour package selling website. A visitor can see a couple of tour package on the home page and All packages page. A visitor must have an account to see details or buy a package.
desc2: After creating an account a user can see his/her orders also can see all users orders and a user can add more tour packages from Add new package page. A new visitor can create an account with email and password or they can directly log in with a google account.

desc1: Acme Fitness is a fitness course selling website. A new visitor to Acme Fitness will see some fitness courses and a couple of fitness trainers on the home page.
desc2: If someone wants to see details or buy any of Acme Fitness’s courses, he/she have to create an account or log in with an existing account. After logging in visitor can see all details about the course and he/she will see the trainer of the associated course
